hero.title: Type in the box to make any website or app
hero.subtitle: Describe your idea and watch Kliv create a fully functional application or website in minutes. No coding required.
hero.placeholder: Describe the app or website you want to build...
typingExamples: A stunning e-commerce store with secure payments
An interactive dashboard for real-time analytics
A dynamic blog with rich content and comments
A personalized fitness tracker with progress charts
A sleek portfolio site to showcase your work
A robust booking system for any service

examples.label: Try these examples:
examples.todoFull: Create a beautiful todo application with drag-and-slop functionality, color-coded categories like Work, Personal, and Shopping, and smooth animations. Include features like priority levels, due dates, and a clean dashboard that shows your progress. Make it responsive so it works perfectly on both desktop and mobile devices.
examples.dashboardFull: Build a stunning sales analytics dashboard with interactive charts showing revenue trends, top-performing products, and customer insights. Include beautiful data visualizations with bar charts, line graphs, and pie charts that update in real-time. Add filters for different time periods and export functionality for reports.
examples.blogFull: Design a modern personal blog with a clean, magazine-style layout featuring rich text editing, image galleries, and social sharing buttons. Include a comment system where readers can engage with your posts, tag-based navigation, and a search function. Make it SEO-friendly with beautiful typography and fast loading times.

hero.inputLabel: Describe your app or website idea

community.title: Explore What's Possible

howItWorks.title: How Kliv Works
howItWorks.subtitle: From idea to reality in four simple steps

step1.title: Describe Your Idea
step1.description: Simply tell Kliv what you want to build in plain English. No technical jargon required.

step2.title: AI Creates Your App
step2.description: Our AI understands your vision and generates clean, modern code using the latest technologies.

step3.title: Real-time Preview
step3.description: Watch your app come to life instantly in the preview window. See every change as it happens.

step4.title: Iterate and Perfect
step4.description: Continue chatting to refine features, fix issues, and perfect your application until it's exactly right.

features.title: Everything Your App Needs
features.subtitle: Build complete applications with user accounts, data storage, file uploads, and email — all managed by AI. No technical setup required.

userAccounts.title: User Accounts & Login
userAccounts.description: Add user registration, login, and password recovery to your app. Secure authentication built-in and ready to use.

database.title: Store Your Data
database.description: Save and organize your app's information. Lists, forms, user profiles — the AI sets up the database automatically.

fileUploads.title: File Uploads & Images
fileUploads.description: Let users upload profile pictures, documents, or photos. Automatic image optimization and secure file storage included.

email.title: Send Emails
email.description: Send welcome emails, notifications, or password resets. Email templates and delivery handled for you.

hosting.title: Hosting Included
hosting.description: Your app goes live instantly at your own web address. Fast, reliable hosting with nothing to configure.

domain.title: Custom Domain
domain.description: Use your own domain name like www.yourbusiness.com. Professional addresses that build trust with your users.

mobile.title: Works on Any Device
mobile.description: Your app automatically adapts to phones, tablets, and computers. Perfect display on every screen size.

team.title: Team Collaboration
team.description: Work together with your team. Multiple people can build and manage your app with different permission levels.

ai.title: AI Does the Building
ai.description: Just describe what you want in plain language. The AI handles all the technical work to make it happen.

page.title: Powerful Features for Modern Development
page.subtitle: Everything you need to build, deploy, and manage your applications with AI assistance.

aiChat.title: AI Chat Interface
aiChat.description: Chat with Kliv's AI to describe your ideas in plain language. The AI understands context and builds exactly what you envision.

livePreview.title: Live Preview
livePreview.description: See your changes instantly in the preview window as you chat. Watch your app come to life in real-time without any compilation delays.

codeGeneration.title: Smart Code Generation
codeGeneration.description: Generate clean, maintainable code using React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. All code follows industry best practices.

responsive.title: Responsive Design
responsive.description: Every app is built mobile-first with responsive design principles, ensuring perfect display on all devices and screen sizes.

sourceCode.title: Source Code Access
sourceCode.description: View and understand your project's source code with the built-in code viewer. Toggle between chat and code views seamlessly.

debugging.title: AI-Powered Debugging
debugging.description: Kliv can access console logs and debug issues automatically, helping you fix problems without technical knowledge.

iterative.title: Iterative Development
iterative.description: Make changes step by step. Kliv encourages breaking down complex features into manageable pieces for better results.

versionControl.title: Version History
versionControl.description: Revert to any previous version of your project with a single click. Never lose your progress or accidentally break your app.

oneClick.title: One-Click Publishing
oneClick.description: Deploy your app to the web instantly with Kliv's built-in hosting. Share your creation with the world in seconds.

customDomain.title: Custom Domains
customDomain.description: Connect your own domain name to your Kliv app. Professional hosting with SSL certificates included.

github.title: GitHub Integration
github.description: Export your project to GitHub and continue development with your preferred tools and workflows.

remix.title: Project Remixing
remix.description: Fork and remix existing projects to create new variations. Perfect for learning and building upon existing ideas.

klivCloud.title: Kliv Cloud Backend
klivCloud.subtitle: Complete backend infrastructure managed by AI. No server configuration, database setup, or API deployment required.
klivCloud.intro: Kliv Cloud provides a complete backend for your applications, automatically built and managed by your AI assistant. When you describe what your app needs, the AI sets up a secure database, creates server-side functions, manages API credentials, and configures access control — all without you writing a single line of code.
klivCloud.enterprise: Your backend runs on enterprise-grade infrastructure with globally replicated databases, row-level security, automatic audit trails, and encrypted secrets storage. Everything is accessible through a visual admin interface where you can view your data, monitor functions, and manage your project.

database.title: Database
database.description: Store your application data with automatic security, backups, and audit trails. The AI creates tables, configures relationships, and manages all technical details.

content.title: Content Storage
content.description: Upload and manage files like images, documents, and videos with automatic optimization and access control. Perfect for user avatars, file sharing, and image galleries.

secrets.title: Secrets Management
secrets.description: Securely store API credentials and sensitive configuration. Secrets are encrypted, masked in the UI, and automatically available to your functions.

functions.title: Edge Functions
functions.description: Server-side JavaScript for complex logic, external API integration, and secure operations. The AI writes the code based on your description.

admin.title: Admin Interface
admin.description: Visual tools to browse data, monitor functions, check logs, and manage your backend without writing code.

email.title: Email Delivery
email.description: Send transactional emails, notifications, and marketing messages with template management and custom SMTP support.

emailTemplates.title: Email Templates
emailTemplates.description: Create reusable email templates with Markdown formatting and dynamic variables for personalized messaging.

technology.title: Technology Stack
technology.subtitle: Built on industry-leading technologies that ensure quality, performance, and maintainability

react.title: React & TypeScript
react.description: Built with the latest React and TypeScript for type-safe, maintainable code that scales with your project.

tailwind.title: Tailwind CSS
tailwind.description: Beautiful, responsive designs using the most popular utility-first CSS framework in the industry.

shadcn.title: Shadcn/ui Components
shadcn.description: Pre-built, accessible components that follow modern design principles and best practices.

automaticSetup.title: Automatic Setup
automaticSetup.description: AI creates your database, functions, and access control

enterpriseSecurity.title: Enterprise Security
enterpriseSecurity.description: Row-level security, encryption, and audit trails

visualAdmin.title: Visual Admin
visualAdmin.description: Manage data, monitor functions, no code required

globalReplication.title: Global Replication
globalReplication.description: Fast, reliable database with automatic backups

aiChat.point1: Describe complex features in plain language and watch them come to life
aiChat.point2: Iterate naturally through conversation — no technical documentation needed
aiChat.point3: Works with databases, APIs, authentication, and complex business logic

livePreview.point1: Professional UI components styled with Tailwind CSS out of the box
livePreview.point2: Fully responsive layouts that work perfectly on mobile, tablet, and desktop
livePreview.point3: Accessible components following WCAG guidelines for inclusive user experiences

codeGeneration.point2: Test on any device or browser directly from your workspace
codeGeneration.point3: Fast iteration cycles mean less waiting, more creating

responsive.point1: Automatic GitHub integration keeps your code safe and version-controlled

pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
pricing.subtitle: Start building for free, upgrade when you need more power
pricing.noPlansAvailable: No plans available at this time.
pricing.signupsDisabled: Signups are disabled for this plan

q1.question: What are agentic credits?
q1.answer: Agentic credits power the AI that builds your apps. Each credit lets the AI make one change to your project. Most features take 5-15 credits to build. Credits refresh daily.

q2.question: Can I cancel anytime?
q2.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Your plan will remain active until the end of your billing period, and you won't be charged again.

q3.question: What happens to my apps if I downgrade?
q3.answer: Your apps stay online and fully functional. You'll keep access to everything you've built. Downgrading only affects your daily credit allocation and premium features.

q4.question: Do you offer refunds?
q4.answer: We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee on all paid plans. If you're not satisfied within the first two weeks, we'll refund your payment in full.

q5.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
q5.answer: Yes, you can change your plan at any time. Upgrades take effect immediately. Downgrades take effect at the end of your current billing cycle.

q6.question: What does Enterprise include?
q6.answer: Enterprise plans include dedicated infrastructure, custom SLA guarantees, priority support, SSO/SAML integration, advanced security features, and volume discounts for teams.

about.title: Democratizing App Development
about.subtitle: We believe everyone should be able to bring their ideas to life, regardless of their technical background.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: At Kliv, we're on a mission to make app and website development accessible to everyone. We believe that great ideas shouldn't be limited by technical barriers or the need to learn complex programming languages.
mission.paragraph2: Our AI-powered platform allows anyone to describe their vision in plain language and watch as it transforms into a fully functional web application. Whether you're an entrepreneur with a startup idea, a small business owner looking to establish an online presence, or someone who simply wants to bring a creative project to life, Kliv is here to help you succeed.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

accessibility.title: Accessibility First
accessibility.description: We're committed to breaking down the technical barriers that prevent people from creating digital solutions. Our platform is designed to be intuitive and approachable for users of all skill levels.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We leverage cutting-edge AI technology to transform natural language descriptions into production-ready code, making the development process faster and more intuitive than ever before.

empowerment.title: Empowerment
empowerment.description: We believe in empowering individuals and businesses to take control of their digital presence without depending on expensive development teams or lengthy learning curves.

community.title: Community
community.description: We're building a community where creators, entrepreneurs, and innovators can bring their ideas to life and share their success stories with others who are just starting their journey.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Kliv was born from a simple observation: too many great ideas never see the light of day because of technical barriers. We saw talented entrepreneurs, creative professionals, and business owners with brilliant concepts who were held back by the complexity and cost of traditional software development.
story.paragraph2: Our team of experienced developers and AI researchers came together with a shared vision: what if we could make app development as simple as having a conversation? What if anyone could describe their idea in plain English and watch it come to life instantly?
story.paragraph3: Today, Kliv serves thousands of users worldwide, from solo entrepreneurs launching their first startup to established businesses expanding their digital presence. Every project built on our platform represents someone's dream becoming reality, and that's what drives us forward every day.

technology.title: Built on Modern Technology
technology.paragraph1: Behind Kliv's simple interface lies a sophisticated technology stack designed for reliability, performance, and scalability. Every application built with Kliv uses industry-standard technologies including React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, ensuring your projects are built on a solid foundation.
technology.paragraph2: Our AI understands not just what you want to build, but how to build it properly. It generates clean, maintainable code that follows best practices, so your applications are not only functional but also professional-grade and ready for growth.
technology.paragraph3: With built-in integrations for databases, authentication, and deployment, Kliv provides everything you need to go from idea to live application without the complexity of managing multiple tools and services.

careers.title: Join Our Mission
careers.subtitle: Help us democratize app development and empower creators worldwide.

intro.paragraph1: At Kliv, we're building the future of software development. Our AI-powered platform is transforming how people create applications, making development accessible to everyone regardless of their technical background.
intro.paragraph2: We're a fast-growing startup backed by leading investors, serving thousands of users worldwide. Join our remote-first team and help shape the next generation of development tools.

remote.title: Remote-First
remote.description: Work from anywhere in the world. We believe great talent isn't limited by geography.

growth.title: Growth Mindset
growth.description: We invest in our team's development and encourage continuous learning and experimentation.

impact.title: High Impact
impact.description: Your work directly affects thousands of creators and entrepreneurs building their dreams.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We're at the forefront of AI and development tools, pushing the boundaries of what's possible.

openings.title: Open Positions
openings.subtitle: All positions are fully remote. Fluency in English is required for all roles.
openings.include: Please include your resume and a brief cover letter explaining why you're interested in the role.

privacy.subtitle: We're committed to protecting your data and being transparent about how we use it.

press.title: Press & Media
press.subtitle: News, resources, and information for journalists and media professionals covering Kliv.

about.title: About Kliv
about.paragraph1: Kliv is an AI-powered platform that enables anyone to build professional web applications through natural conversation. Founded in 2025, Kliv is transforming how people create digital products by eliminating traditional technical barriers.
about.paragraph2: Unlike traditional development tools that require coding knowledge, Kliv uses advanced AI to understand what users want to build and generates production-ready applications automatically. The platform includes complete backend infrastructure (database, authentication, file storage, email) so users can build real, fully-functional applications without managing servers or technical configuration.
about.paragraph3: Kliv serves entrepreneurs, small businesses, and creators worldwide who want to bring their ideas to life without hiring development teams or spending months learning to code. Applications built with Kliv are powered by industry-standard technologies including React, TypeScript, and modern cloud infrastructure.

assets.title: Press Kit & Brand Assets
assets.contactForMaterials: For logos, screenshots, brand guidelines, and other press materials, please contact our press team and we'll be happy to provide what you need.

contactSection.title: Media Inquiries
contactSection.description: For press inquiries, interviews, or additional information about Kliv, please contact our press team. We typically respond within 24 hours.

foundersNote.title: Founder's note
foundersNote.paragraph1: I've always loved writing code. It's my type of creative work. Some people paint, some write music. I can't do either of those things well. But I can write code well. There's a real joy in taking basic logical building blocks and shape them into something useful and elegant.
foundersNote.paragraph2: That kind of deep, hands-on programming will always have a place. There will always be people who want a stick shift, even when most cars are automatic or EVs that don't even have gears to shift. There are still people who ride horses. Some subset of people will always be passionate about their particular interest even if it might no longer have the same economic value it once did.
foundersNote.paragraph3: The reality is: the bulk of routine software work is moving on. Most of it -- all the work that millions of engineers do every day that don't really require taste or creativity. Shifting data around, building CRUD interfaces -- is already better handled by machines. And that's fine. That's progress.
foundersNote.paragraph4: Kliv is my attempt to build for that future.
foundersNote.paragraph5: The role of the hands-on programmer is fading — not disappearing, but shifting and that's fine.
foundersNote.paragraph6: Let's not get stuck in nostalgia for how things used to be. Let's build what's next.

whatIsKliv.title: What is Kliv
whatIsKliv.paragraph1: Kliv is an agentic AI platform that builds web applications through interactive conversation. Unlike the first generation of AI builders that generate everything in a single reply, Kliv works like a real developer - thinking through requirements, inspecting files, making iterative changes, and refining code step-by-step.
whatIsKliv.paragraph2: Watch as the AI reasons through your project, asks clarifying questions, and methodically builds your application. Perfect for rapid prototyping, entrepreneurs, and businesses who want professional applications without the technical complexity.
whatIsKliv.paragraph3: Start with a library of pre-built apps and websites or build from scratch - either way, you'll have a custom application in minutes. Your app gets free hosting on kliv.site from day one, with instant deployment and no configuration needed.
whatIsKliv.paragraph4: The built-in workspace lets you edit code directly, preview changes before publishing, and maintain complete revision history so you can roll back to any previous version. Connect to GitHub for source control when your team grows, or export your entire codebase anytime.
whatIsKliv.paragraph5: Every tool you need for professional app development is integrated into a single platform, from initial prototype through production deployment and ongoing updates. Kliv includes a fully integrated backend that gives every app database, authentication, and API capabilities out of the box.

whereWereGoing.title: Where we're going
whereWereGoing.paragraph1: Building frontend applications with AI is largely solved. Our focus now is expanding Kliv Cloud with the infrastructure features that power real-world applications:

scheduled.title: Scheduled Jobs
scheduled.description: Run backend tasks on a schedule - daily reports, cleanup jobs, and recurring processes

webhooks.title: Webhooks & Events
webhooks.description: React to external events from payment providers, CRMs, and third-party services

streaming.title: Streaming Responses
streaming.description: Stream large datasets and real-time AI responses without waiting for full completion

realtime.title: Real-time Subscriptions
realtime.description: Live database updates, collaborative editing, and instant notifications across clients

vector.title: Vector Search
vector.description: Semantic search and AI-powered recommendations using vector embeddings

queues.title: Background Queues
queues.description: Process heavy workloads asynchronously - image processing, exports, and batch operations

whereWereGoing.paragraph2: We're expanding the platform so AI can assemble more of your infrastructure stack — reliably and at scale.

investors.title: Investors
investors.paragraph1: Kliv is backed by leading investors who share our vision of democratizing software development through AI.
investors.paragraph2Suffix: , a venture capital firm focused on backing innovative technology companies.
investors.paragraph3: For inquiries about investing in Kliv, please contact us at
